name: Standing Light Punch
notes: Can be rapid canceled

name: Standing Heavy Punch
notes: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Standing Heavy Kick
notes: * Adds +17 frames of advantage on a standing opponent during a Punish CounterForces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent for a Punish Counter

name: Crouching Light Punch
notes: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Light Kick
notes: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Medium Punch
notes: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

name: Crouching Heavy Kick
notes: Knockdown time extended when attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

name: Jumping Light Kick
notes: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Medium Punch
notes: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Jumping Medium Kick
notes: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Heavy Punch
notes: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Révérence
notes: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Tomoe Derrière
notes: juggle state changes when attack lands as a Punish Counter on a grounded opponentForces a juggle state when the attack lands as a Punish Counter on a mid-air opponent

name: En Haut(1)
notes: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: En Haut(2)
notes: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Temps Lié
notes: * 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

name: L Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
notes: Medal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 2000 (2300)Medal Level 2: 2300 (2645)Medal Level 3: 2700 (3105)Medal Level 4: 3000 (3450)Medal level 5: 3700 (4255)Values in parentheses represent damage on Punish Counter

name: M Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
notes: Medal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 2000 (2300)Medal Level 2: 2300 (2645)Medal Level 3: 2700 (3105)Medal Level 4: 3000 (3450)Medal level 5: 3700 (4255)Values in parentheses represent damage on Punish Counter

name: H Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)

name: L Rond-point
notes: The upper part of Manon's body is invincible against mid-air attacks from frames 5 - 15

name: M Rond-point
notes: The upper part of Manon's body is invincible against mid-air attacks from frames 7 - 19

name: H Rond-point
notes: The upper part of Manon's body is invincible against mid-air attacks from frames 9 - 22On hit, block or armored hit, can be canceled into a special move or Super Art from frames 44 - 46

name: OD Rond-point
notes: Invincible against mid-air attacks from frames 4 - 16On hit, block or armored hit, can be canceled into a special move or Super Art from frames 41 - 46

name: M Dégagé
notes: Considered airborne from frames 15 - 39

name: H  Dégagé
notes: Low attack invincibility from frames 9 - 19

name: OD Dégagé
notes: Low attack invincibility from frames 11 - 12, as well as throw invincibilityConsidered airborne from frames 9 - 21

name: L Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
notes: With Classic ControlsProjectile invincibility from frames 3 - 21Transition into feint by holding the button (total 33 frames)Medal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 1350 (1360)Medal Level 2: 1500 (1510)Medal Level 3: 1650 (1660)Medal Level 4: 1800 (1810)Medal Level 5: 1950 (1960)Values in parentheses represent damage on Punish CounterWith Modern ControlsMedal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 1080 / 1088Medal Level 2: 1200 / 1208Medal Level 3: 1320 / 1328Medal Level 4: 1440 / 1448Medal Level 5: 1560 / 1568Values after the backslash represent damage on Punish Counter

name: M Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
notes: Projectile invincibility from frames 3 - 24Transition into feint by holding the button (total 34 frames)Medal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 1400 (1420)Medal Level 2: 1550 (1570)Medal Level 3: 1700 (1720)Medal Level 4: 1850 (1870)Medal Level 5: 2000 (2020)Values in parentheses represent damage on Punish Counter

name: H Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
notes: Projectile invincibility from frames 3 - 28Transition into feint by holding the button (total 35 frames)Medal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 1500 (1540)Medal Level 2: 1650 (1690)Medal Level 3: 1800 (1840)Medal Level 4: 1950 (1990)Medal Level 5: 2100 (2140)Values in parentheses represent damage on Punish Counter

name: OD Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
notes: With Classic ControlsInvincible against strikes from the knee and up from frames 3 - 26Invincible against projectiles from frames 3 - 26Transition into feint by holding the button (total 35 frames)Medal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 1500 (1540)Medal Level 2: 1650 (1690)Medal Level 3: 1800 (1840)Medal Level 4: 1950 (1990)Medal Level 5: 2100 (2140)Values in parentheses represent damage on Punish CounterWith Modern ControlsMedal level increases by a single level on hit*Damage increases the higher the Medal levelMedal Level 1: 1200 / 1232Medal Level 2: 1320 / 1352Medal Level 3: 1440 / 1472Medal Level 4: 1560 / 1592Medal Level 5: 1680 / 1712Values after the backslash represent damage on Punish Counter

name: SA1 Arabesque
notes: Invincible against strikes and throws from frames 1 - 13Minimum guaranteed damage is 30%Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter

name: SA2 Étoile
notes: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 9Considered airborne from frames 21 - 36 and 68 - 118Minimum guaranteed damage is 40%Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter

name: SA3 Pas de Deux
notes: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 8Minimum guaranteed damage is 50%Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter* Can only be canceled into standing heavy punch and Rond-point

name: CA Pas de Deux
notes: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 8Minimum guaranteed damage is 50%Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter* Can only be canceled into standing heavy punch and Rond-point

name: Ouchi Gari
notes: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage- Super Art gauge increases by 4000- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Uchi Mata
notes: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage- Super Art gauge increases by 4000- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Backward Dash
notes: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

name: Drive Impact: Glissade
notes: Super Armor for 2 attacks from frames 1 - 27Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wallOn Punish Counter or after a successful hit after Super Armor absorbs a hit, the following properties change:- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground- Juggle state time is increased if the opponent is in the air- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

name: Drive Reversal: Écarté
notes: Recoverable damageCompletely invincible from frames 1 - 225 frames of recovery added on hit

name: Drive Parry
notes: *1 Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive Rush*2 Parry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are heldOnly blocks can be performed during the recovery periodAlways in Punish Counter state during execution.

name: Perfect Parry (strike)
notes: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameFully invincible for 6 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Perfect Parry (projectile)
notes: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameNo screen freeze occurs.The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Parry Drive Rush
notes: Screen freeze occurs on the 10th frame* Can be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move   Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

name: Cancel Drive Rush
notes: Screen freeze occurs on the 9th frame* Can be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move   Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
